title: Kitty Carousel
description: Cats on an infinitely moving carousel, with buttons that correspond with and summon the appropriately positioned cat.

title: Connect Four
description: Connect Four created entirely from Javascript and CSS.

title: Incremental Search
description: A word bank containing a list of countries and territories can be searched through, with results displayed alphabetically. The search is incremental, going beyond just the first letter of the word.

title: Spotify Search
description: An app built on the Spotify API that searches through Spotify for Artist and Album.
